item.description:
Hello Ladies!!

Come out and celebrate the launch of PreApps.com, at their inaugural "App Demo & Drinks" meetup! PreApps is the exclusive place to preview mobile apps before they become available in the app stores... in other words, it's your access to what's next and fresh!

Featured developers will showcase their apps (yours truly among them;) ), receive feedback and share tips.

So, come enjoy some cocktails, schmooze with great people and find out what is hot and new in the world of mobile apps!! See you there!


*RSVP by Tuesday January 22nd as I must submit how many BCGs will be attending.*
item.name: PreApps.com Launch Party!!
